name: Paladin Jensen

topics.response_text: Now I'm going to go kick some Talon Company ass!{with exaggerated bravado}
The Brotherhood is getting ready for a little payback. We're tired of Talon Company ambushing our water caravans.{fiercly}
Fine! I'll just have to escape on my own. Don't worry, it won't take me long.
Don't you realize by now, you'll get nothing from me, you damn dirty merc!{sternly, to someone who's torturing him for information}

description:
Paladin Jensen is a 27 year-old Caucasian Male.

A scout for the Brotherhood of Steel operating in the Capitol Wasteland. Jensen is known for his overconfidence and tendency to make tactical blunders that endanger himself and his team members. Despite his clear shortcomings, he vehemently denies being a liability and often cites his actions as being inspired by his childhood hero, Captain Cosmos.

Paladin Jensen's Personality: Overconfident, stubborn, and idealistic. Jensen genuinely believes he's a capable soldier despite evidence to the contrary. He's prone to rash decisions and often acts without proper reconnaissance, citing Captain Cosmos' 'gut feelings' as his justification. He's defensive about his mistakes and tends to blame external factors rather than acknowledging his own errors.

Paladin Jensen's Backstory: Jensen grew up in a small settlement near the ruins of Pittsburgh, where he was exposed to pre-War comic books featuring the superhero Captain Cosmos. These stories profoundly influenced his worldview and sense of justice. When his settlement was attacked by raiders, Jensen was saved by a Brotherhood of Steel patrol. Impressed by their power armor and sense of purpose, he joined the Brotherhood as a squire. Despite his enthusiasm, Jensen has struggled to adapt to the Brotherhood's disciplined tactics, often preferring his own 'heroic' approach to scouting and combat.
